participant_1.background:
I work hard and save money for my future.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.
I have never been arrested but my parents are worried I'm lonely.
i wish i could live in a fantasy world.
I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.

participant_2.background:
I am a swimmer who is proud of my family but sometimes feel disconnected from them.
I make sure my beta fish travels with me when I move.
I bought a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.

content.text: I am doing well! Thank you for asking! And you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am a little sad because my parents moved to Florida recently, but I am excited for the future.
I am sorry to hear that your parents moved away, but I am glad that you are excited for the future!
Thank you! I am trying to be positive about it. I am also a bit worried because they are worried I am lonely.
I am sure you are not lonely! You have your pet dogs and you sound like a very interesting person.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I am a swimmer and I love to read fantasy novels. Do you have any hobbies?
I am a swimmer too! I also love to play tabletop games.
That is awesome! I have always wanted to try a tabletop game.
You should! They are a lot of fun.
I will have to look into it!
Great! I hope you enjoy it!
Thank you! I hope you have a great day!
